issues.interest: To provide members with opportunities to learn about the politicval process and political issues.
To provide members with oppotunities to become involved in and contribute to the development and advancement of the Republican Party within Lewis and Clark County, Montana, and the United States.
To provide members with opportunities for political expression and recognition.
To bring young people into the Republican Party.
To develop and maintain and Young Republican organization in Lewis & Clark County.
